title: So Kayle got her visual update to her armor...

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! As we continue the 9.5 PBE cycle, today's patch includes tweaks to K/DA Ahri Prestige Edition's splash art, small tweaks to base Kayle and Riot Kayle, balance, and more! Continue reading for more information!

body:
...and for the most part, it's fine. I mean, it does look a bit more like armor now. But as it stands, Kayle still has the purple spandex pants and over the last few days of looking at it, it is getting on my nerves a bit. That's just not how I view Kayle, it's very odd for her to have that.

I don't know if Riot may/will be willing to continue adding changes to the model, like adding her tabard back or make an option to toggle her helmet in final form (have a plume made of fire for it for more classic feel), because at this point it's most likely Riot won't do much besides gameplay balancing her next week, but I kind of hope they do. I might now play her now but, like many people, we have an idea on what a champs iconic look should be and Kayle, while slightly closer now, I think needs just a bit more work.

Also, I believe there needs to be adjustments to the splash art to better suit the breastplate.

replies.body: The picture posted there is wrong or Riot are officially trolling.

As was feared.

They will refuse to do anything below the waist.

The chest is so weirdly form fitting, especially w/ the V shape.  

It looks as though someone drew a triangle on a piece of paper and then folded it up.

It works for cloth or leather armour, but plate?

Hopefully we get a [breastplate w/ a raised protrusion](https://image.boom-app.wiki/wiki/59fab0ea3d1bee03b541dcd4/card/w/012.jpg?w=960) and the tabard(?) posted in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/EvRgW1W8-i-made-a-kayle-edit-that-likely-constitutes-the-least-amount-of-work-necessary-to-fix-her-armor) thread.

I mean, it still leaves her most vulnerable areas (torso and thighs) unprotected, but it's an improvement over the first iteration.
